title: Superman: Escape from Bizarro World
description: Bizarro, the twisted, imperfect duplicate of Superman, has taken Pa Kent to Bizarro World -- and only Superman has a chance of rescuing him!On this cubic world, populated by Bizarro versions of the Justice League of America, Lois Lane and more, Superman must stop Bizarro's tormented, Frankenstein-like rampage long enough to get away -- but will Bizarro versions of Doomsday and other evildoers prove to be too much for Superman? This volume also includes several classic tales of Bizarro that served as inspiration for modern stories of that doomed world.Collects ACTION COMICS #855-857, SUPERMAN #140, DC COMICS PRESENTS #71 and MAN OF STEEL #5
author: Geoff Johns
